arabic: وَالذّٰرِيٰتِ ذَرْوًاۙ
transliteration_en: Waz-zaariyaati zarwaa
transliteration_id: Waż-żāriyāti żarwā(n).
translation_en: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing
translation_id: Demi (angin) yang menerbangkan debu,

arabic: فَالْحٰمِلٰتِ وِقْرًاۙ
transliteration_en: Falhaamilaati wiqraa
transliteration_id: Fal-ḥāmilāti wiqrā(n).
translation_en: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]
translation_id: demi (awan) yang mengandung muatan (hujan),

arabic: فَالْجٰرِيٰتِ يُسْرًاۙ
transliteration_en: Faljaariyaati yusraa
transliteration_id: Fal-jāriyāti yusrā(n).
translation_en: And those [ships] sailing with ease
translation_id: demi (kapal-kapal) yang melaju (di atas air) dengan mudah,

arabic: فَالْمُقَسِّمٰتِ اَمْرًاۙ
transliteration_en: Falmuqassimaati amraa
transliteration_id: Fal-muqassimāti amrā(n).
translation_en: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,
translation_id: dan demi (malaikat-malaikat) yang membagi-bagi segala urusan,

arabic: اِنَّمَا تُوْعَدُوْنَ لَصَادِقٌۙ
transliteration_en: Innamaa too'adoona la-saadiq
transliteration_id: Innamā tū‘adūna laṣādiq(un).
translation_en: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
translation_id: sesungguhnya apa yang dijanjikan kepadamu pasti benar

arabic: وَّاِنَّ الدِّيْنَ لَوَاقِعٌۗ
transliteration_en: Wa innad deena la waaqi'
transliteration_id: Wa innad-dīna lawāqi‘(un).
translation_en: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
translation_id: dan sesungguhnya pembalasan pasti terjadi.

arabic: وَالسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِۙ
transliteration_en: Wassamaaa'i zaatil hubuk
transliteration_id: Was-samā'i żātil-ḥubuk(i).
translation_en: By the heaven containing pathways,
translation_id: Demi langit yang mempunyai jalan-jalan yang kukuh,

arabic: اِنَّكُمْ لَفِيْ قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍۙ
transliteration_en: Innakum lafee qawlim mukhtalif
transliteration_id: Innakum lafī qaulim mukhtalif(in).
translation_en: Indeed, you are in differing speech.
translation_id: sesungguhnya kamu benar-benar dalam keadaan berselisih.

arabic: يُّؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ اُفِكَۗ
transliteration_en: Yu'faku 'anhu man ufik
transliteration_id: Yu'faku ‘anhu man ufik(a).
translation_en: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.
translation_id: Telah dijauhkan darinya (Al-Qur’an dan Rasul) orang yang dipalingkan.

arabic: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Qutilal kharraasoon
transliteration_id: Qutilal-kharrāṣūn(a).
translation_en: Destroyed are the falsifiers
translation_id: Terkutuklah orang-orang yang banyak berdusta,

arabic: الَّذِيْنَ هُمْ فِيْ غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Allazeena hum fee ghamratin saahoon
transliteration_id: Allażīna hum fī gamratin sāhūn(a).
translation_en: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.
translation_id: (yaitu) orang-orang yang terbenam (dalam kebodohan) lagi lalai (dari urusan akhirat)!

arabic: يَسْـَٔلُوْنَ اَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّيْنِۗ
transliteration_en: Yas'aloona ayyaana yawmud Deen
transliteration_id: Yas'alūna ayyāna yaumud-dīn(i).
translation_en: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"
translation_id: Mereka bertanya, “Kapankah hari Pembalasan itu?”

arabic: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Yawma hum 'alan naari yuftanoon
transliteration_id: Yauma hum ‘alan-nāri yuftanūn(a).
translation_en: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire
translation_id: (Hari Pembalasan terjadi) pada hari (ketika) mereka diazab dalam api neraka.

arabic: ذُوْقُوْا فِتْنَتَكُمْۗ هٰذَا الَّذِيْ كُنْتُمْ بِهٖ تَسْتَعْجِلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Zooqoo fitnatakum haa zal lazee kuntum bihee tas ta'jiloon
transliteration_id: Żūqū fitnatakum, hāżal-lażī kuntum bihī tasta‘jilūn(a).
translation_en: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
translation_id: (Dikatakan kepada mereka,) “Rasakanlah azabmu! Inilah azab yang dahulu kamu minta agar disegerakan.”

arabic: اِنَّ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ فِيْ جَنّٰتٍ وَّعُيُوْنٍۙ
transliteration_en: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
transliteration_id: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa ‘uyūn(in).
translation_en: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,
translation_id: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang bertakwa berada dalam (surga yang penuh) taman-taman dan mata air.

arabic: اٰخِذِيْنَ مَآ اٰتٰىهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۗ اِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا قَبْلَ ذٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِيْنَۗ
transliteration_en: Aakhizeena maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanoo qabla zaalika muhsineen
transliteration_id: Ākhiżīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum, innahum kānū qabla żālika muḥsinīn(a).
translation_en: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.
translation_id: (Di surga) mereka dapat mengambil apa saja yang dianugerahkan Tuhan kepada mereka. Sesungguhnya mereka sebelum itu (di dunia) adalah orang-orang yang berbuat kebaikan.

arabic: كَانُوْا قَلِيْلًا مِّنَ الَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: kaanoo qaleelam minal laili maa yahja'oon
transliteration_id: Kānū qalīlam minal-laili mā yahja‘ūn(a).
translation_en: They used to sleep but little of the night,
translation_id: Mereka sedikit sekali tidur pada waktu malam;

arabic: وَبِالْاَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa bilashaari hum yastaghfiroon
transliteration_id: Wa bil-asḥāri hum yastagfirūn(a).
translation_en: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,
translation_id: dan pada akhir malam mereka memohon ampunan (kepada Allah).

arabic: وَفِيْٓ اَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّاۤىِٕلِ وَالْمَحْرُوْمِ
transliteration_en: Wa feee amwaalihim haqqul lissaaa'ili walmahroom
transliteration_id: Wa fī amwālihim ḥaqqul lis-sā'ili wal-maḥrūm(i).
translation_en: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.
translation_id: Pada harta benda mereka ada hak bagi orang miskin yang meminta dan yang tidak meminta.

arabic: وَفِى الْاَرْضِ اٰيٰتٌ لِّلْمُوْقِنِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa fil ardi aayaatul lilmooqineen
transliteration_id: Wa fil-arḍi āyātul lil-mūqinīn(a).
translation_en: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]
translation_id: Di bumi terdapat tanda-tanda (kebesaran Allah) bagi orang-orang yang yakin.

arabic: وَفِيْٓ اَنْفُسِكُمْ ۗ اَفَلَا تُبْصِرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa feee anfusikum; afalaa tubsiroon
transliteration_id: Wa fī anfusikum, afalā tubṣirūn(a).
translation_en: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?
translation_id: (Begitu juga ada tanda-tanda kebesaran-Nya) pada dirimu sendiri. Maka, apakah kamu tidak memperhatikan?

arabic: وَفِى السَّمَاۤءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوْعَدُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa fissamaaa'i rizqukum wa maa too'adoon
transliteration_id: Wa fis-samā'i rizqukum wa mā tū‘adūn(a).
translation_en: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
translation_id: Di langit terdapat pula (hujan yang menjadi sebab) rezekimu dan apa yang dijanjikan kepadamu.

arabic: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاۤءِ وَالْاَرْضِ اِنَّهٗ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ اَنَّكُمْ تَنْطِقُوْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Fawa Rabbis samaaa'i wal ardi innahoo lahaqqum misla maa annakum tantiqoon
transliteration_id: Fa wa rabbis-samā'i wal-arḍi innahū laḥaqqum miṡla mā annakum tanṭiqūn(a).
translation_en: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.
translation_id: Maka, demi Tuhan langit dan bumi, sesungguhnya (apa yang dijanjikan kepadamu itu) pasti akan nyata seperti (halnya) kamu berucap.

arabic: هَلْ اَتٰىكَ حَدِيْثُ ضَيْفِ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ الْمُكْرَمِيْنَۘ
transliteration_en: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen
transliteration_id: Hal atāka ḥadīṡu ḍaifi ibrāhīmal-mukramīn(a).
translation_en: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -
translation_id: Sudahkah sampai kepadamu (Nabi Muhammad) cerita tentang tamu Ibrahim (malaikat-malaikat) yang dimuliakan?

arabic: اِذْ دَخَلُوْا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوْا سَلٰمًا ۗقَالَ سَلٰمٌۚ قَوْمٌ مُّنْكَرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun qawmum munkaroon
transliteration_id: Iż dakhalū ‘alaihi fa qālū salāmā(n), qāla salām(un), qaumum munkarūn(a).
translation_en: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.
translation_id: (Cerita itu bermula) ketika mereka masuk (bertamu) kepadanya, lalu mengucapkan, “Salam.” Ibrahim menjawab, “Salam.” (Mereka) adalah orang-orang yang belum dikenal.

arabic: فَرَاغَ اِلٰٓى اَهْلِهٖ فَجَاۤءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِيْنٍۙ
transliteration_en: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihee fajaaa'a bi'ijlin sameen
transliteration_id: Farāga ilā ahlihī fa jā'a bi‘ijlin samīn(in).
translation_en: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
translation_id: Kemudian, dia (Ibrahim) pergi diam-diam menemui keluarganya, lalu datang (kembali) membawa (daging) anak sapi gemuk (yang dibakar).

arabic: فَقَرَّبَهٗٓ اِلَيْهِمْۚ قَالَ اَلَا تَأْكُلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Faqarrabahooo ilaihim qaala alaa taakuloon
transliteration_id: Fa qarrabahū ilaihim, qāla alā ta'kulūn(a).
translation_en: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
translation_id: Dia lalu menghidangkannya kepada mereka, (tetapi mereka tidak mau makan). Ibrahim berkata, “Mengapa kamu tidak makan?”

arabic: فَاَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيْفَةً  ۗقَالُوْا لَا تَخَفْۗ وَبَشَّرُوْهُ بِغُلٰمٍ عَلِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Fa awjasa minhm khee fatan qaaloo laa takhaf wa bashsharoohu bighulaamin 'aleem
transliteration_id: Fa aujasa minhum khīfah(tan), qālū lā takhaf, wa basysyarūhu bigulāmin ‘alīm(in).
translation_en: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) menyimpan rasa takut terhadap mereka. Mereka berkata, “Janganlah takut!” Mereka memberi kabar gembira kepadanya dengan (akan kelahiran) seorang anak yang sangat berilmu (Ishaq).

arabic: فَاَقْبَلَتِ امْرَاَتُهٗ فِيْ صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوْزٌ عَقِيْمٌ
transliteration_en: Fa aqbalatim ra-atuhoo fee sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa wa qaalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem
transliteration_id: Fa aqbalatimra'atuhū fī ṣarratin fa ṣakkat wajhahā wa qālat ‘ajūzun ‘aqīm(un).
translation_en: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"
translation_id: Istrinya datang sambil berteriak (terperanjat) lalu menepuk-nepuk wajahnya sendiri dan berkata, “(Aku ini) seorang perempuan tua yang mandul.”

arabic: قَالُوْا كَذٰلِكِۙ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۗاِنَّهٗ هُوَ الْحَكِيْمُ الْعَلِيْمُ  ۔
transliteration_en: Qaaloo kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki innahoo huwal hakeemul 'aleem
transliteration_id: Qālū każālik(i), qāla rabbuk(i), innahū huwal-ḥakīmul-‘alīm(u).
translation_en: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Demikianlah Tuhanmu berfirman. Sesungguhnya Dialah Yang Maha Bijaksana lagi Maha Mengetahui.”

arabic: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ اَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُوْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Qaala famaa khatbukum ayyuhal mursaloon
transliteration_id: Qāla famā khaṭbukum ayyuhal-mursalūn(a).
translation_en: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) bertanya, “Apa urusan pentingmu, wahai para utusan?”

arabic: قَالُوْآ اِنَّآ اُرْسِلْنَآ اِلٰى قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Qaalooo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen
transliteration_id: Qālū innā ursilnā ilā qaumim mujrimīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Sesungguhnya kami diutus kepada kaum yang berdosa (kaum Lut untuk menyiksanya)

arabic: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّنْ طِيْنٍۙ
transliteration_en: Linursila 'alaihim hijaa ratam min teen
transliteration_id: Linursila ‘alaihim ḥijāratam min ṭīn(in).
translation_en: To send down upon them stones of clay,
translation_id: agar kami menimpa mereka dengan batu-batu yang berasal dari tanah liat

arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Musawwamatan 'inda rabbika lilmusrifeen
transliteration_id: Musawwamatan ‘inda rabbika lil-musrifīn(a).
translation_en: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."
translation_id: yang ditandai oleh Tuhanmu untuk (membinasakan) orang-orang yang melampaui batas.”

arabic: فَاَخْرَجْنَا مَنْ كَانَ فِيْهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Fa akhrajnaa man kaana feehaa minal mu'mineen
transliteration_id: Fa akhrajnā man kāna fīhā minal-mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.
translation_id: Kami mengeluarkan orang-orang mukmin yang berada di dalamnya (negeri kaum Lut).

arabic: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيْهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Famaa wajadnaa feehaa ghaira baitim minal muslimeen
transliteration_id: Famā wajadnā fīhā gaira baitim minal-muslimīn(a).
translation_en: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.
translation_id: Kami tidak mendapati di dalamnya, kecuali sebuah rumah dari orang-orang muslim (Lut dan keluarganya).

arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيْهَآ اٰيَةً لِّلَّذِيْنَ يَخَافُوْنَ الْعَذَابَ الْاَلِيْمَۗ
transliteration_en: Wa taraknaa feehaaa aayatal lillazeena yakhaafoonal 'azaabal aleem
transliteration_id: Wa taraknā fīhā āyatal lil-lażīna yakhāfūnal-‘ażābal-alīm(a).
translation_en: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
translation_id: Kami meninggalkan suatu tanda (kebesaran-Nya di (negeri) itu bagi orang-orang yang takut pada azab yang pedih.

arabic: وَفِيْ مُوْسٰىٓ اِذْ اَرْسَلْنٰهُ اِلٰى فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطٰنٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
transliteration_en: Wa fee Moosaaa iz arsalnaahu ilaa Fir'wna bisultaa nim mubeen
transliteration_id: Wa fī mūsā iż arsalnāhu ilā fir‘auna bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
translation_en: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
translation_id: (Begitu pula Kami meninggalkan) pada Musa (tanda-tanda kekuasaan Allah) ketika Kami mengutusnya kepada Fir‘aun dengan membawa mukjizat yang nyata.

arabic: فَتَوَلّٰى بِرُكْنِهٖ وَقَالَ سٰحِرٌ اَوْ مَجْنُوْنٌ
transliteration_en: Fatawalla biruknihee wa qaala saahirun aw majnoon
transliteration_id: Fa tawallā biruknihī wa qāla sāḥirun au majnūn(un).
translation_en: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."
translation_id: Kemudian, dia (Fir‘aun) bersama bala tentaranya berpaling dan (Fir‘aun) berkata, “(Dia adalah) seorang penyihir atau orang gila.”

arabic: فَاَخَذْنٰهُ وَجُنُوْدَهٗ فَنَبَذْنٰهُمْ فِى الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيْمٌۗ
transliteration_en: Fa akhaznaahu wa junoo dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi wa huwa muleem
transliteration_id: Fa akhażnāhu wa junūdahū fanabażnāhum fil-yammi wa huwa mulīm(un).
translation_en: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.
translation_id: Maka, Kami menghukumnya beserta bala tentaranya, lalu Kami menenggelamkan mereka ke dalam laut dalam keadaan melakukan perbuatan yang tercela.

arabic: وَفِيْ عَادٍ اِذْ اَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيْحَ الْعَقِيْمَۚ
transliteration_en: Wa fee 'Aadin iz arsalnaa 'alaihimur reehal'aqeem
transliteration_id: Wa fī ‘ādin iż arsalnā ‘alaihimur-rīḥal-‘aqīm(a).
translation_en: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.
translation_id: (Begitu pula Kami meninggalkan) pada (kaum) ‘Ad (tanda-tanda kekuasaan Allah) ketika Kami mengirim kepada mereka angin yang membinasakan.

arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ اَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ اِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيْمِۗ
transliteration_en: Maa tazaru min shai'in atat 'alaihi illaa ja'alat hu karrameem
transliteration_id: Mā tażaru min syai'in atat ‘alaihi illā ja‘alathu kar-ramīm(i).
translation_en: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.
translation_id: (Angin) itu tidak meninggalkan apa pun pada semua yang dilandanya, kecuali menjadikannya bagai tulang yang hancur.

arabic: وَفِيْ ثَمُوْدَ اِذْ قِيْلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوْا حَتّٰى حِيْنٍ
transliteration_en: Wa fee Samooda iz qeela lahum tamatta''oo hattaa heen
transliteration_id: Wa fī ṡamūda iż qīla lahum tamatta‘ū ḥattā ḥīn(in).
translation_en: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."
translation_id: (Begitu pula Kami meninggalkan) pada (kaum) Samud (tanda-tanda kekuasaan Allah) ketika dikatakan kepada mereka, “Bersenang-senanglah kamu sampai waktu yang ditentukan!”

arabic: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ اَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَاَخَذَتْهُمُ الصّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنْظُرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim fa akhazal humus saa'iqatu wa hum yanzuroon
transliteration_id: Fa‘atau ‘an amri rabbihim fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣā‘iqatu wa hum yanẓurūn(a).
translation_en: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.
translation_id: Lalu, mereka bersikap angkuh terhadap perintah Tuhannya. Maka, mereka disambar petir sementara mereka menyaksikan(-nya).

arabic: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوْا مِنْ قِيَامٍ وَّمَا كَانُوْا مُنْتَصِرِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Famas tataa'oo min qiyaaminw wa maa kaanoo muntasireen
transliteration_id: Famastaṭā‘ū min qiyāmiw wa mā kānū muntaṣirīn(a).
translation_en: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.
translation_id: Mereka sama sekali tidak mampu bangun dan tidak pula mendapat pertolongan.

arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوْحٍ مِّنْ قَبْلُ ۗ اِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا قَوْمًا فٰسِقِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaano qawman faasiqeen
transliteration_id: Wa qauma nūḥim min qabl(u), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
translation_en: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
translation_id: Sebelum itu (Kami telah membinasakan) kaum Nuh. Sesungguhnya mereka adalah kaum fasik.

arabic: وَالسَّمَاۤءَ بَنَيْنٰهَا بِاَيْىدٍ وَّاِنَّا لَمُوْسِعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wassamaaa'a banainaa haa bi aydinw wa innaa lamoosi'oon
transliteration_id: Was-samā'a banaināhā bi'aidiw wa innā lamūsi‘ūn(a).
translation_en: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
translation_id: Langit Kami bangun dengan tangan (kekuatan Kami) dan sesungguhnya Kami benar-benar meluaskan(-nya).

arabic: وَالْاَرْضَ فَرَشْنٰهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمٰهِدُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wal arda farashnaahaa fani'mal maahidoon
transliteration_id: Wal-arḍa farasynāhā fa ni‘mal-māhidūn(a).
translation_en: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
translation_id: Bumi Kami hamparkan. (Kami adalah) sebaik-baik Zat yang menghamparkan.

arabic: وَمِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa min kulli shai'in khalaqnaa zawjaini la'allakum tazakkaroon
transliteration_id: Wa min kulli syai'in khalaqnā zaujaini la‘allakum tażakkarūn(a).
translation_en: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.
translation_id: Segala sesuatu Kami ciptakan berpasang-pasangan agar kamu mengingat (kebesaran Allah).

arabic: فَفِرُّوْٓا اِلَى اللّٰهِ ۗاِنِّيْ لَكُمْ مِّنْهُ نَذِيْرٌ مُّبِيْنٌۚ
transliteration_en: Fafirrooo ilal laahi innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen
transliteration_id: Fa firrū ilallāh(i), innī lakum minhu nażīrum mubīn(un).
translation_en: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
translation_id: Maka, (katakanlah kepada mereka, wahai Nabi Muhammad,) “Bersegeralah kembali (taat) kepada Allah. Sesungguhnya aku adalah seorang pemberi peringatan yang jelas dari-Nya untukmu.
